content:
Hi! I'm not a manager, but I wanted to ask if my studio, TTA (The Transgender Army) could be put in the gaehives description? It's a studio welcoming all trans people, weather enby, ftm, mtf, and more. I understand if thats not possible, so don't feel pressured to say yes. Have a nice day! -Ren
the link is here: https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/31340523/comments
